title: Plan an Unforgettable Bachelorette Party in Key West

image.name: Plan an Unforgettable Bachelorette Party in Key West
image.alt: Plan an Unforgettable Bachelorette Party in Key West

post_content:
One of the best places for bachelorette parties in the US, Key West offers all the fun of a lively girls’ getaway with the calming vibe of an oceanside retreat. Our Stock Island resort allows you and your girls to unwind in luxury comfort — away from the hustle and bustle of Duval Street — just a short drive from the action. Enjoy a quiet weekend on property with your closest girlfriends, or hop on our complimentary shuttle and experience the best of downtown Key West. There’s something for everyone at Oceans Edge Key West. Use our guide below to start planning your bachelorette party in the Keys.

What to Do

Pack your bachelorette party with some of the best things to do in Key West. Start your mornings with a refreshing yoga class on the beach. During the day, explore the rich history of the island on a tour of the top local historical sites — from the Hemingway Home to the Truman Little White House. Close out your day in the Keys with a sunset cruise out on the deep blue waters. We’ve partnered with several local boat charters who are ready to customize an unforgettable outing just for you.

Where to Eat

Don’t miss out on the diverse culinary delights found on the island during your bachelorette party in Key West. For classic Florida Keys seafood, try the famous Conch Republic Seafood Company. For an authentic taste of Cuba, stop by El Siboney for their popular lechon asado. No culinary tour is complete without a stop by Blue Heaven for their homemade key lime pie. Read our full guide to the most famous food in Key West.

Where to Go Out

Get the ultimate bachelorette party experience at a Key West drag show. Enjoy a range of performances from some of Key West’s favorite queens. Catch a show at 801 Bourbon Bar or Aqua Bar and Nightclub, and stick around after the show to dance the night away.

With Oceans Edge Key West as your home base, your bachelorette party is sure to be a trip you’ll be talking about for years to come. Our Stock Island resort features all the amenities you and your girls need to enjoy a stress-free getaway. From six oceanfront pools to delectable property dining, everything you need is in reach at Oceans Edge Key West.
